Text: Granville is a village in Licking County, Ohio, United States.

Text: Granville, Ohio:  The village is located in a rural area of rolling hills in central Ohio.

Text: Granville, Ohio:  It is 35 miles east of Columbus, the state capital, and 7 miles west of Newark, the county seat.
